mapper.select: SELECT no,category,id,subject,dbday,hit,num FROM (SELECT no,category,id,subject,TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,hit,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,category,id,subject,regdate,hit FROM board ORDER BY no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(no,category,id,subject,content,group_id) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1, 1) FROM board), #{category}, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_id)+1, 1) FROM board) )

INSERT INTO Board_Reply(no,bno,id,name,content,group_id) VALUES( Board_Reply_no_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{id}, #{name}, #{content}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(group_id)+1,1) FROM Board_Reply WHERE board.no=board_reply.bno) )
mapper.select: SELECT no,category,bno,id,content, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') as dbday,group_tab FROM board_Reply WHERE bno=#{bno} WHERE board.no=board_reply.bno ORDER BY group_id DESC,group_step ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeReply(no,bno,id,name,content,group_id,group_step,group_tab,root) VALUES( freeReply_no_seq.nextval, #{no}, #{category}, #{bno}, #{id}, #{content}, #{group_id}, #{group_step}, #{group_tab}, #{root} ) WHERE board.no=board_reply.bno
mapper.select: SELECT depth,root FROM board WHERE no=#{no}
